medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 50
medalList.description: Your decent performance has given you a good reputation.

medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 100
medalList.description:
Your growth and improvement reflects well upon your reputation.
One success is the starting point of your next success.

medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 120
medalList.description:
Your reputation makes you stand out from the crowd.
Never stop growing, never stop exploring, never stop moving forward.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 100 days after waking up
medalList.description:
A trimmed medal issued to commemorate the 100th day since your awakening.
Since the first day of your hundred days, you’ve never stopped fighting for us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 365 days after waking up
medalList.description:
A trimmed medal issued to commemorate a full year of service.
The seasons change, but your mission has not changed, and your battles will continue.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 30 unique Operators
medalList.description: You’ve met some Operators for the first time.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 60 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You’ve developed a mutual understanding with quite a few Operators.
The growing group of Operators is sure to pose new challenges, but the benefit to Rhodes Island will be much greater in time.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 90 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You’ve brought together many Operators under the same banner.
Maintaining interpersonal relationships between such a large number of Operators requires immense dedication.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 130 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You’ve touched the hearts and minds of countless Operators, developing trusting relationships.
The Crown cannot win a war, and reins are unable to steer an army. What you need is not a scepter, but rather sincerity.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 30 times
medalList.description: Your first time on the job.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 100 times
medalList.description: You’ve developed your method of recruiting.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 300 times
medalList.description:
You’ve developed a keen eye for talent.
By starting with developing strong relationships, you’ve paved the way for many more people to become Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 500 times
medalList.description:
Your ideas flow like a river.
The channels where intelligence and information flow are often rich beds of talent, many of whom possess the potential to become Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 1000 times
medalList.description:
The search for talent is of paramount importance to you.
Whereas other people find but sand in the desert, you will uncover secrets, wealth, and even new Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 3-8
medalList.description: You’ve witnessed a series of tragedies.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages from the Prologue to Episode 3 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You’ve fought off the enemies under excruciating conditions.
It seems you make a good team with the Rhodes Island squad.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 4-10
medalList.description: Your squad has survived a battle against FrostNova.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 4 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You’ve become an expert of challenges.
Your operatives can now carry out your instructions with exact precision.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 5-10
medalList.description: Rhodes Island and the L.G.D. have successfully fended off a crisis.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 5 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out missions in sprawling cities.
You are skilled in creating advantages and adapting to your surroundings.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 5 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
Fortunately, you’ve escaped unscathed.
The arrows of Inferno just barely missed you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 6-7
medalList.description: Your operators have retrieved Faust's crossbow.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 6-17
medalList.description: You’ve become friends with FrostNova.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 6 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out missions in the freezing cold.
Desperate straits are an opportunity, and you are not one to let an opportunity slip by.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 6 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
You haven’t become an ice sculpture.
The icy feats of Cocytus are now evaporating away.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 7-2
medalList.description: Ch'en Hui-chieh has chosen her own path.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 7-18
medalList.description: News of Patriot’s death echoed throughout Chernobog Core City.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 7 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out assaults during stealthy infiltrations.
As long as you remain unseen by the enemy's mainstay, all methods are fair game.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 7 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
Congratulations, you haven’t been crushed into pieces.
The Starfire-like halberd has merely smashed into the ground.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage R8-11
medalList.description: The Emperors' Blades have splintered Talulah's Infected faction.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage M8-8
medalList.description: You’ve dealt with the Class II Infection Threat at the sarcophagus with Kal’tsit, and that took you on a trip down memory lane.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage JT8-3
medalList.description: The Chernobog Incident has been successfully resolved. Give yourself a pat on the back.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 8 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to see your objectives through in a battlefield of everchanging circumstances.
Perhaps the enemy is the side that was overwhelmed in your eyes?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 8 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
There remains a tiny trace of warmth on your sleeve.
The Draco's flames consumed all in its path, yet you remain unscathed.

medalList.getMethod: Reach weekly reward limit 1800
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully honing your skills during the Annihilation period.
You have proved that a high intensity, prolonged command only makes you all the stronger.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Chernobog and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Chernobog Annihilation mission.
Chernobog’s refugees are now being escorted out of the city by Rhodes Island.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lungmen Outskirts and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Lungmen Outskirts Annihilation mission.
Lungmen’s citizens now recognize Rhodes Island's professionalism and trustworthiness.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lungmen Downtown and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Lungmen Downtown Annihilation mission.
Lungmen’s citizens now hold Rhodes Island in high esteem.

medalList.medalName: The Grand Knight Territory Outskirts Action Medal
medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation The Grand Knight Territory Outskirts and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Grand Knight Territory Outskirts Annihilation mission or practice.
No matter how the mission was completed, Rhodes Island is now highly appraised in the Kazimierz merchants’ eyes.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Frozen Abandoned City and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Frozen Abandoned City Annihilation mission or practice.
Be it training or actual combat, this land of death will never engulf all that walks upon it.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Abandoned Mine and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Ursus Abandoned Mine Annihilation mission or simulation.
No matter whether simulated or put into practice, the departed souls once trapped in those mines will rest in peace.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: Under your guidance, one of your Operators has passed the Promotion Qualification Exam.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have passed the Promotion Qualification Exam.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 50 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: The Promotion Qualification Exam has gradually turned into just another way for your Operators to gauge their personal growth.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 80 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description:
The Promotion Qualification Exam is no more than a basic test for your Operators to improve themselves.
After being promoted, will they continue to strive for greater heights?

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Under your leadership, an Operator has discovered their unique value to the team.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 10 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have taken on important roles within their respective posts.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 25 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Many of your Operators have gone above and beyond the call of duty.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 40 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description:
A few of your Operators have become role models within their fields.
Rhodes Island constantly seeks to expand its talent pool. If there’s a position you can’t fill, you sometimes have to cultivate that talent yourself.

medalList.getMethod: Train 1 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description: One of your Operators has mastered their techniques upon the battlefield.

medalList.getMethod: Train 25 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description: After mastering their individual abilities, your Operators seek to develop synergies.

medalList.getMethod: Train 60 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description:
Your Operators are exploring the possibility of effective joint operations.
Combined-squad operations not only test the capabilities of the commander, but also test the ability of Operators to work together - the effective use of their skills only first step towards enabling that.

medalList.getMethod: Train 1 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description: One of your Operators has honed their combat skills to perfection.

medalList.getMethod: Train 5 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have fully developed their skills on the battlefield.

medalList.getMethod: Train 10 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description:
Many of your Operators have fully grasped how to leverage their position on the battlefield.
While tempering oneself is no easy feat, learning to work towards a common goal with others can be more difficult.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operators to Elite 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with one of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operators to Elite 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with several of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 50 Operators to Elite 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with many of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 100 Operators to Elite 100
medalList.description:
You have become good friends with a significant amount of your Operators.
Someone is bound to say hi and make conversation every time you walk down the hallway.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operators to Elite 200
medalList.description: One of your Operators is now willing to trust you with their life.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operators to Elite 200
medalList.description: Several of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 40 Operators to Elite 200
medalList.description: Many of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 60 Operators to Elite 200
medalList.description:
A significant number of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives. 
How in the world are you able to keep such close relationships with so many operators?

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Courier, Gavial, and Dur-nar
medalList.description: Your willingness to help others is a major reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Courier, Gavial, and Dur-nar, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have gained the recognition of messengers, combat medics, and instructors.
You all share the same view, that trust is indispensable.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Ethan and Breeze
medalList.description: Your hard work and dedication is a reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Ethan and Breeze, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have gained the recognition of a master of stealth and a declining physician.
You all share the same view, that hard work will inevitably pay off.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Lancet-2 and Castle-3
medalList.description: Some of Closure’s robots have already been dispatched to your side.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Lancet-2 and Castle-3, and get them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You’ve gained the approval of Guard and Medic Robots.
If not for their lack of a carbon-based body, they’re really just like us.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock 12F's Operator Record 'Certain Choices'
medalList.description:
A person's identity begins and ends with their name.
How are our identities, our beginnings, and our ends defined?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Kroos's Operator Record 'Apples'
medalList.description:
A kind of food and also the marksmen's favorite target.
If you ever find Kroos's toy arrows stuck anywhere that's not an apple, that's because she never intended to shoot the apple in the first place.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Rope's Operator Record 'Floral Perfume'
medalList.description:
A fragrance neither luxuriant nor special; just perfect for a girl who grew up on the streets of Lungmen.
Rope holds this perfume dear to her heart. It was something she could only ever look at through the shops' windows, and now she has one specially made for her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Shirayuki's Operator Record 'The Way of Shinobi'
medalList.description:
The way of the shinobi is a strange, poorly traveled road.
As Chief Engineer Closure can attest, having ShiraYuki inspect pipes is perhaps a fine decision indeed.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Broca's Operator Record 'The First Step Towards Trust'
medalList.description:
There exists no organizations that we can come to like at first glance.
All we can do is to convince everyone through our actions that our ideals are far from empty promises.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Provence's Operator Record 'Coworkers'
medalList.description:
While you are worried about others, there are bound to be others who are concerned about you.
Thanks to Tsukinogi's thoughtful advice, our Medical operators stand ready to keep Provence from sneaking out through the landship's entrance.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Firewatch's Operator Record 'On My Way'
medalList.description:
Firewatch believes the future holds naught but a path of revenge.
Perhaps it was a pitstop, or perhaps it was a detour, but, by chance, she came upon Rhodes Island.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ceobe's Operator Record 'XXL Honey Biscuit'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal handcrafted by Vulcan. Modeled after a honey biscuit, these medals are given to Ceobe as a reward for her performance.
Though Ceobe is particularly fond of these medals, they are actually the same size as all other medals; the only difference being the letters 'XXL' emblazoned on them.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Eyjafjalla's Operator Record 'Heart of a Scholar'
medalList.description:
The heart of a scholar is an abstract concept. It is something that cannot be quantified, and can only be conceptualized in our hearts.
Be careful not to let mere representations cloud your judgment.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Eyjafjalla's Operator Record 'Volcano'
medalList.description:
There is a volcano is Eyjafjalla's mind.
That once burned away is truth, and eternity.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Phantom's Operator Record 'Cooperation'
medalList.description:
There is much that we cannot accomplish alone. Therefore, we must work together.
It is part of a Rhodes Island operator's required studies to learn how to work with our many peculiar teammates to bring our missions to a successful conclusion.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lancet-2's Operator Record 'A Piece of Graffiti'
medalList.description:
It is said to be a piece of Columbian slang. 
Lancet-2 is not certain about whether she is fond of it since she is a robot, yet she appreciate its prettiness.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Melantha's Operator Record 'Team Captain'
medalList.description:
The formation of Reserve Op team A4 is not without twists and turns. 
The instructor believes that Melantha will become a good captain. But what does it take to become one?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lava's Operator Record ''Sisters''
medalList.description:
This isn't something you can just give to other people!
Even if Lava won't acknowledge it, nobody's ever doubted that the sisters truly do get along well.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lava's Operator Record ''Caring''
medalList.description:
Hibiscus is sick?!
This would be Hibiscus's first time ill, and Lava's first time tending to her big sister... right?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Vigna's Operator Record 'What You've Gotta Do'
medalList.description:
For Vigna, rock 'n' roll is her whole hobby.
But it’s not her whole life.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gitano's Operator Record ''Divination''
medalList.description:
Everything has a price, and no price is ever the same.
Divination is much the same: pay their terms, obtain your results.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mayer's Operator Record 'One Packed Daily Schedule'
medalList.description:
Mayer always works around the clock.
Of course, she asked for that herself, since she likes it.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Warfarin's Operator Record ''Monster''
medalList.description:
Warfarin never hides that she's a Vampire.
No need to panic, and no use for fear.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Angelina's Operator Record ''Package with No Recipient''
medalList.description:
A work slip-up?
Angelina sure doesn't feel like anyone here would send her a present.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ethan's Operator Record ''Old Friends in Foreign Places''
medalList.description: 'I've got a friend. We haven't met in so long. I only know everything worked out fine for him after.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Perfumer's Operator Record ''Refurbishment Plans''
medalList.description:
The Convalescent Garden needs a refresh to keep up with the times.
To this end, there's a great deal Perfumer needs to do, just like when she first established the Garden.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Liskarm's Operator Record ''Apple Pie Party, Now Preparing!''
medalList.description: 'You guys can cook. I've still got a bill I need to settle.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Liskarm's Operator Record ''Still Waiting''
medalList.description:
Reality isn't as fine as it is in novels.
That said, the longing and fantasy of it will pave the road for realists. Just keep waiting for her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Schwarz's Operator Record ''The Day We Left Home''
medalList.description:
In the past, Schwarz's life was always very simple.
But now, things have gotten complicated.

You sensed through to Dusk's field of view.
Once, she said she was merely a habitant of a painting. Perhaps she truly landed her guess. But she doesn't plan on doing anything about it. What about you, then?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, deploy allied units on Marks of Hui and Ming a total of 300 times
medalList.description:
You made your first delve into Dusk's way of the painting.
The next time you meet, she'll bring you aesthetics from a place far above logic.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Leave From Yourself] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
From that home in a memory, you departed.
This place's customs, clothing and buildings were wholly unlike the nomadic cities of Yen in style. Was it someone's faint recollection of their hometown, or a phantasmagoria brought about by the wielder of a brush?

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-10 with a 3-star rating while using [Two-Step Firecracker mk2] less than 4 times
medalList.description:
You avoided all possible excess reliance on Nian's items. This is very wise.
Heaven knows what's inside one of these two-step firecrackers, but it's not a normal Originium explosive at any rate. There's never anything wrong with using a little care.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while deploying Roadblocks less than 8 times
medalList.description:
You used appropriate obstructions to put the Ink Spirits to the test.
It has to be said, if some of the Ink Spirits truly existed in reality, it'd be a chance to change up the presently high-risk, high-barred state of the Originium Slug pet market.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-EX-8 with a 3-star rating without destroying [Free]'s shield [Break the Chains]
medalList.description:
You turned a blind eye as it broke its own shackles. This was your mercy.
'Free' had never been truly free to be before, and had actually rarely experienced situations like this. For a moment, it even sympathized with you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Come To Yourself] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You prevailed over formidable musings.
The name 'Ink Spirit' was one Saga chose. Before that, they all actually had their own names. Er, some of them were pretty adorable—did Dusk really pick them out? That immovable object?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Ask Yourself] and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You traveled the landscapes of Dusk's scrolls, just as Saga did.
The fact Saga escaped by herself is something Dusk has taken to heart even now. After all, Saga's far too young a being. Doesn't it come off as degrading of Dusk's standing?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Lava the Purgatory
medalList.description:
You bore witness to an Operator's future.
Lava's already greatly grown, and become quite maturely steady, but she still revels in her additionally earned title of 'Purgatory,' despite it seeming a little redundant at that point.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, consume 4000 Dusk Inkstones in [Answer Yourself]
medalList.description:
You collected a great deal of Dusk's beloved objects.
There's just one tiny little concern. Can you really take what you brought out of Dusk's scrolls, and throw them into a workshop rest assured?

An engraved medal based upon a certain lead seal.
No matter how deep into the abyss the secrets are hidden, they will surely all emerge into the world someday.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Lead Seal.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, obtain Operator Tuye
medalList.description:
An engraved medal proving your recruitment of an Operator during Operation Lead Seal.
The deserts of Sargon are vast and endless, yet Tuye will always find her way back.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Lead Seal.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Lead Seal.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Lead Seal.

You understand everything that this prison break stands for.
When even rules can be bent because of the circumstances, what should we remain steadfast for?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, imprison prisoners a total of 100 times
medalList.description:
You have built a reputation among the prisoners.
Your exquisite combat skills have even reached Warden Barton's ears, resulting in the bestowal of this medal.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Robin
medalList.description:
You have assisted a girl who is lost about the future.
It is hard to say she had almost fallen into the wrong path. The other path open to her may not be one full of missteps, though it is certainly not faultless either.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, consume 4000 Factory Steel in [Secret Channel]
medalList.description:
You have amassed a large amount of resources via the prisoners' special channels.
You have no idea where they obtained these resources, and you have no idea what their uses are inside the prison.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Be Prepared!] and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You have finished plotting out your prison break.
During the process, Mina discovered this medal by chance. It seems to be the warden's go-to gift for the dignitaries who visit the prison.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Escape Plan] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
You have successfully assisted Anthony's escape from the prison.
Though smog looms in the air outside, the air here also signifies freedom. This is where it all begins.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-EX-1 with a 3-star rating with at least 4 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
You have ensured the functionality of the majority of the devices here.
You have also discovered that certain models of these devices bear the Rhine Lab mark.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Mansfield Daily Life] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You have grown accustomed to the clashes between prisoners here. You are even enjoying it to some degree.
Perhaps Anthony should hand his position over to you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-8 with a 3-star rating with at least 4 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
Much of the prisoners have surrendered to your 'power.'
The crystallization of technology and wisdom is not something that can be resisted with mere might.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-EX-8 with 3 stars, with at least 2 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
You have overcome the adverse circumstances by taking advantage of your surroundings.
Evidently, when we find ourselves unable to take on a problem with our strength alone, we must make up for it with our smarts. Brains and brawn, both complementing one another in perfect harmony.

A medal engraved based on the personal seal of a Catastrophe Messenger.
All in the name of saving even more lives.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Cinder.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Cinder.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, purchase Bagpipe's outfit - Queen, No. 1
medalList.description:
An engraved medal that was bundled with a casual outfit obtained from Operation Cinder.
Even race cars give way to Bagpipe out of respect.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Cinder.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles in unfamiliar terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Cinder.

medalList.medalName: Cinder: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Cinder.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Cinder.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Cinder.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Cinder.

You witnessed a knight's modern form. You soon witness a knight's fading afterglow.
In this era doomed beyond reproach, even if the road's futility is set in stone, the radiance still shines on.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, shoot down a total of 100 Sponsor Drones, Luxury Sponsor Drones or Cheering Sponsor Drones
medalList.description:
You took full advantage of the rules.
At times, for the benefit of their own knights, coaches and sponsors will think of every trick in the book to shake out those luxury-lined VIP pockets wandering the exhibition room.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Jousting Arena] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
You successfully rose in rank in the Major.
You'll find these commemorative medals all over the Grand Knight Territory, and they're very cheap. The 1st, 7th, 18th and 22nd medals within the series fetch the highest prices on the collectors' market.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MN-8 with a 3-star rating while shooting down Sponsor Drones at least 4 times
medalList.description:
Even from the jaws of a most sudden attack, you still snatched victory.
When faced with their executioners, sometimes you just need to give the General Chamber of Commerce a taste of their own medicine.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MN-EX-8 with a 3-star rating while shooting down Sponsor Drones at least 3 times
medalList.description:
You defeated a powerful enemy with some help from outside.
Time was, arrogant knights would never rely on anything but fighting ability. But once the first knight, for victory, for the audience, for the fame and wealth, picked up a bottled blue drink dropped from a drone, everything changed.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Gloompincer Cage] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You competed with ever stronger knights.
Once, a group of knights fell to the losers' after the first game of the Major. On a legendary knight's sheer force of will, they won back game after game to finally reach the top. It's a legend furnished by each new telling, but the truth is, those knights promptly disbanded afterwards due to money problems.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Offsite Activity Venue] and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You participated in all off-site events.
They say that if a person had twelve hours in the day to play, they'd still need a hundred years before they enjoyed every corner Kazimierz has to offer.

medalList.getMethod: Read 15 piece(s) of news in Maria Nearl
medalList.description:
You read a deluge of skin-deep media reports. We're sorry you had to.
What destroys the meaning of knights isn't just knights themselves. Every spectator who cheers has a responsibility, and every suit who manufactures those cheers is offending a creed.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Whislash
medalList.description:
The coat of arms Zofia made for herself when she participated.
A coat of arms' significance has nowadays been worn bare, the original idea lost. But even so, Zofia still spent three of her afternoons carving away in earnest.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, spend 4000 Mieszko Comp Securities in the Duty-Free Shop
medalList.description:
You went on a shopping spree in the duty-free shop outside the arena.
Since it doesn't pay tax to the General Chamber of Commerce, it can sell its goods cheap, and an 'alarming' amount at that. A trap laid by consumerism.

You endured a breathtakingly dangerous vacation. 
Brawls, indulgence, survival of the strongest, and little regard for the future. In places yet untouched by civilization, you found that life without technology can be quite wonderful indeed.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, clear a total of 100 Giant Mushrooms
medalList.description: Your profound love for mushrooms is admirable. However, for the sake of your health, please roast them before consumption.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Tomimi
medalList.description:
Your wisdom has convinced this girl. 
We have reason to believe that upon learning to expand her horizons, she will do even better.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, spend 4000 Mechanical Parts in the Inam Committee
medalList.description:
You spent a lot of money in Inam’s shop. 
No merchant can hate a customer like you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Great Chief’s Path] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
Your vacation has come to an end. 
Presumably, this joyous experience will leave a mark within your memories. We all know that there is much more on Terra than pain and suffering— though this is occasionally forgotten.

medalList.getMethod: Complete RI-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while clearing Giant Mushrooms at least 5 times
medalList.description:
You completed an excellent challenge. 
Everyone admits that you are a true warrior.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Gavial’s Footprints] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You overcame difficult missions. 
Gavial whole-heartedly commends your bravery.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [The Brave's Trials] and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You thoroughly enjoyed your adventure. 
Zumama created this medal just for you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete RI-8 with a 3-star rating while clearing Giant Mushrooms no more than 2 times
medalList.description:
You maintained the self-control that symbolizes your status as a civilized person. 
But sometimes, giving in to indulgence isn’t such a bad thing.

medalList.getMethod: Complete RI-EX-8 with a 3-star rating while clearing Giant Mushrooms at least 7 times
medalList.description:
You have completely integrated into life here. 
Trusting in the power afforded to you by your own two hands is quite refreshing, isn’t it?

A medal engraved with the blueprint of a certain lost weapon.
The weapons of the past cannot be reforged, but their will and spirit will remain in the world forever.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Blade.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Blade.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, obtain Operator Scene
medalList.description:
An engraved medal proving your recruitment of an Operator during Operation Blade.
Imperfection does not mean that all is lost.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Blade.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles in unfamiliar terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Blade.

medalList.medalName: Blade: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Blade.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Blade.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Blade.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Blade.

An engraved medal based on the insignia of a legendary mercenary time.
Accomplish what others have never done.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Pyrite.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Blade, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Pyrite.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, purchase Manticore’s outfit - Invisible Dirge
medalList.description:
An engraved medal that was bundled with a casual outfit obtained from Operation Pyrite.
Manticore might not understand the purpose of this, but you certainly do.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Pyrite.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles in unfamiliar terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Pyrite.

medalList.medalName: Pyrite: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Pyrite.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Pyrite.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Pyrite.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pyrite, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Pyrite.

You have witnessed everything.
The suspect is dead, the trail has gone cold, and the murderer has disappeared into the tempest of unrest. Only hatred remains to spring the trap, waiting for this side of Terra to fall into the net of law.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Capitol Spire] with a 3-star rating, not including stages in the Occupied Zone (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
You resolved a case within a remote town in Leithanien.
Not everyone bears malice, but 'it' continues to slide deeper into the abyss.

medalList.getMethod: Complete TW-8 with a 3-star rating while controlling all Gramophones at the time of victory
medalList.description:
You took control of all 'Gramophones' and defeated the enemy leader.
The L-44 'Gramophone' is merely an industrial code and product name; the object itself actually does not have any of the functionalities of a gramophone. The rhythmic melody of a rock being struck can perhaps become a new form of music.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in the Occupied Area of [Capitol Spire] on Tribulation Mode
medalList.description:
You have learned this poem.
As the only person who knows the final chapter of this old man’s life experience, you have pieced together the truth after weathering trials and tribulations. Please do not forget him.

medalList.getMethod: Complete TW-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while controlling all Gramophones at the time of victory
medalList.description:
During the most perilous operation, you held onto control of the 'Gramophones.'
Perhaps you should also consider installing an Arts defense system like this?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Silent Frontier] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You have overcome more challenging missions.
Victory brings the hope of unity and survival, giving Wolumonde a path forward.

medalList.getMethod: Complete TW-MO-1 with a 3-star rating
medalList.description:
You resolved the underlying reason for the riots.
Violence is not the answer to everything - order must be achieved.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Folinic
medalList.description:
A medal made by Folinic.
Not everyone is ready to come to terms with their past, nor should we ask for that.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, spend 4000 [Aristocrat’s Antique Aureus] in the August Fair
medalList.description:
You spent a lot of money in Wolumonde.
Everyone is cheering because of the revitalized economy.

medalList.getMethod: Decipher any puzzle in the Antique Diary and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You deciphered the puzzle to reveal a part of the truth.
The old man was the king of his lofty history.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Burnt Offerings] and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
This town will forever remember your contributions.
This tragedy may have been unpreventable, but the outcome could have been worse.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Beyond Here
medalList.description:
An engraved medal based upon the field operation records of Rhodes Island's operators. Each and every footstep bears witness to the experiences the operators encountered.
Each and every moment, a story unfolds in a corner of the world.

medalList.getMethod: During the Beyond Here event, obtain outfit - Frosted Breath
medalList.description:
A commemorative medal that came with your outfit purchase.
This particular design is both cozy and warm; Silence had an order placed on this outfit a long time ago.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Rewinding Breeze
medalList.description:
A stamp, carved by an operator, of the radiant light that struck them while they cooled out on the deck.
It's said that from birth to death, it's always the same breeze blowing by your side.

medalList.getMethod: During the Rewinding Breeze event, obtain Operator Mint
medalList.description:
In accordance with Operator Mint's description, this engraved seal depicts the teethmarks left after a book bites.
Books can bite people? Do books have teeth? Wait, can books even move?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Children of Ursus
medalList.description:
An engraved medal based upon the emblem of Peterheim Middle School.
Even though they’re still not ready for it, they wish to walk towards tomorrow.

medalList.getMethod: During the Children of Ursus event, purchase Absinthe’s Token 1 time.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal restored using a police badge from Absinthe’s collection.
Through bitterness and sorrow, life must continue.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Operational Intelligence
medalList.description:
A template-made engraved medal based upon the emblem used by Intelligence Certification in their archival work.
Our intelligence records will never be complete. The best we can do is to get as close as we can.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Ancient Forge
medalList.description:
An engraved medal made for the Base, bearing Nian’s insignia.
There has yet to be a chef who can craft the kind of spiciness that Nian craves.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all the stories in Stories of Afternoon
medalList.description:
An engraved medal designed from leftover cafeteria vouchers. No cash value, cannot be exchanged for Stories of Afternoon rewards.
There are more stories waiting to be told, and heard.

medalList.getMethod: Complete TW-MO-1 with a 3-star rating while controlling at least 3 Gramophones at the time of victory
During Operation Pyrite, complete Contingency 18 in the Permanent operation site within a week of the start of Operation Pyrite (before 11/18/2020 03:59:59 AM)
During Operation Blade, complete Contingency 18 in the Permanent operation site within a week of the start of Operation Blade (before 2/11/2020 03:59:59 AM)
Complete RI-8 with a 3-star rating without clearing any Giant Mushroom
Complete MN-8 with a 3-star rating while shooting down all Sponsored Drones
During Operation Cinder, complete Contingency 18 in the Permanent operation site within a week of the start of Operation Cinder (before 6/4/2021 03:59:59 AM)
Complete MB-EX-8 with a 3-star rating with at least 3 Imprisonment Devices remaining

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete Contingency 18 in the Permanent operation site within a week of the start of Operation Lead Seal (before 7/20/2021 03:59:59 AM)
Clear WR-10 with a 3-star rating without using any [Two-Step Firecracker mk2]

groupData.groupDesc:
A set of engraved medals that record the circumstances revolving around the tragedy of Wolumonde.
The many cities and spires of Wolumonde may overlook their deaths, but Rhodes Island will not.
Not all violence is justified. Who is the judge of right and wrong in the eyes of a Catastrophe?

A set of engraved medals commemorating the completion of Contingency Contracts during Operation Pyrite.
Each medal bears witness to the contributions you made during Operation Pyrite.
Through the crucible of endless war, new legends are forged and pyrite is cast anew in the flames of perseverance.

A set of engraved medals commemorating the completion of Contingency Contracts during Operation Blade.
Each medal bears witness to the contributions you made during Operation Blade.
Broken by the flames of war, and reforged within your soul; if your heart’s desire is true, then the blade is yours to draw.

groupData.groupName: The Great Chief Returns Medal Set
groupData.groupDesc:
A set of etched medals that record information about Acahualla, Gavial’s hometown. 
Conservatism versus modernization. A typical conflict is resolved here in an atypical manner, and everything ends comically. 
And in the end we find ourselves thinking: Just which is the better way of life?

groupData.groupName: The Grand Knight Territory Medal Set
groupData.groupDesc:
A set of engraved medals that record Maria Nearl's journey of knighthood.
Finding your meaning in life and affirming it is not an act for knights alone.
Where each end is a beginning in turn, a truest journey of knighthood is about to commence.

A set of engraved medals commemorating the completion of Contingency Contracts during Operation Cinder.
Each medal bears witness to the contributions you made during Operation Cinder.
As Catastrophe befalls, your beacon shines radiantly; your homeland may be desolated, but the cinder will burn forevermore.

A set of engraved medals that record the events of the Mansfield prison break in detail.
Most men are willing to pay whatever the cost is to take fate into their own hands.
It is only when fate is actually in their hands that they come to realize it is just the beginning.

groupData.groupName: Operation Lead Seal Engraved Medal Set
groupData.groupDesc:
A set of engraved medals commemorating the completion of Contingency Contracts during Operation Lead Seal.
Each medal bears witness to the contributions you made during Operation Lead Seal.
As Catastrophes run rampant, the treasures lay hidden. Upon all its secrecy must be instilled, lest all be torn asunder by the lead seal.

A set of engraved medals recording a strange, wonderful travels through a painting.
Reality as falsity, falsity as reality, if this complex speculation leaves you already weary, then for the time being, just consider yourself real.
She says she is a habitant of a painting, and no more.
